thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com
thread.title: Tom

author: Tom
title: Tom
text: It's hard to shortly explain our satisfaction with the trip. It was nearly perfect. Made all our promised destinations supported by an outstanding staff on all levels. Food, service, SMEs, and the ships crew. Great ship and wonderful cabin. The landings could not have been more spectacular. I took 3K pics!!! I would do it again in a minute. It was expensive, but worth every penny.
